Kara Bajema spikes the ball past the hands of the Boise State defender in  PERIOD

A few pairs were pushed into tight sets early but the Washington beach volleyball team finished its weekend in Arizona with a  sweep over ColoradoMesa PERIOD

Head coach Scott Whitaker kept the top of his lineup the same with Kara Bajema and Shayne McPherson as the No PERIOD  pair and Natalie Robinson and Chloe Loreen at No PERIOD  PERIOD Both duos were pushed to extra points in the first set but came out with sweeps the Huskies  won   on Court  and   on Court  PERIOD

Behind those two Whitaker changed his pairs up a bit PERIOD Shannon Crenshaw moved up to the No PERIOD  pairing to work with Claire Hoffman forming a team of established indoor hitters in their first beach season PERIOD The two struggled early and were the only pair to drop a set but came back to win in three    PERIOD

With Crenshaw moving up Addie Picha moved down to No PERIOD  with Emma Calle and the pair dominated   PERIOD On Court  Whitaker dropped freshman Scarlett Dahl in favor of Avie Niece who teamed up with Callie Webber for an easy   win PERIOD

Washington will go to Los Angeles next weekend for its first Pac12 matchups of the season PERIOD The Dawgs will take on No PERIOD  Cal No PERIOD  Stanford Utah and No PERIOD  UCLA in a pair of doubleheaders PERIOD
